mobilenetv2.name: MobileNetV2
mobilenetv2.description: Lightweight image classifier (14MB), optimized for mobile devices
mobilenetv2.use_case: General image recognition - animals, objects, scenes

resnet50.name: ResNet50
resnet50.description: Deep residual network (98MB), high accuracy classification
resnet50.use_case: Detailed image recognition with better accuracy than MobileNet

yolov8n.name: YOLOv8n
yolov8n.description: Real-time object detection (13MB), fastest YOLO variant
yolov8n.use_case: Detect multiple objects with bounding boxes - people, vehicles, animals

ssd_mobilenet.name: SSD MobileNet
ssd_mobilenet.description: Single Shot Detector (28MB), efficient object localization
ssd_mobilenet.use_case: Alternative detection architecture, good for embedded devices
